full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI YE GUNG KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BGYI BA'I MNGA' 'BANGS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS, PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU, ,^ BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI, THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE BSGOS BSAM TAN RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
